entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 9:38AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...High Water On Most Rivers This Week... Heavy snowmelt in the Brooks Range is causing water levels to rise on many rivers draining the south side of the Brooks Range. entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 9:38AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...High Water Levels On Most Rivers This Week... Warm temperatures across the Southeast Interior are causing significant high elevation snowmelt. Ice is now gone from most rivers across the Southeast Interior, but many rivers and streams will run high from the snowmelt and cover sloughs and gravel bars with water.
